# Import 2020 Data

Fantasy Points

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
ff_2020 <- read_csv("2020_data.csv")
ff_2020 <- clean_names(ff_2020)
```

Advanced Rushing Stats

```{r}
adv_rush_2020 <- read_csv("adv_rush_2020.csv")
adv_rush_2020 <- clean_names(adv_rush_2020)
```
